src:
Timnas U-19 Berlaga di Kualifikasi AFC, Ini Harapan Iwan Bule
04 Nov 2019, 22:04 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PSSI berharap tim nasional atau Timnas U-19 Indonesia menjadi yang terbaik di Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 pada 6-10 November 2019 di Stadion Madya Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta.
Menurut Ketua Umum PSSI Komjen Pol. Mochamad Iriawan di Kantor Kemenpora, Jakarta, Senin, hal itu demi memenuhi harapan dari masyarakat. “Timnas semestinya bisa menjadi kebanggaan rakyat,” ujar pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule itu.
Timnas U-19 tidak diwajibkan lolos ke Piala Asia U-19 2020 untuk melaju ke Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021.
Sebab, Indonesia sebagai tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021 otomatis lolos ke putaran final. Artinya, tim asuhan pelatih Fakhri Husaini sebenarnya tidak terbebani untuk menjadi yang terbaik di Kualifikasi Piala Asia U-19.
Namun, PSSI tetap meminta Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi dan kawan-kawan untuk tampil maksimal di kualifikasi.
“Pak Presiden Joko Widodo sebelumnya juga menyampaikan agar Indonesia tidak hanya menjadi penyelenggara di Piala Dunia U-20. Kita jangan hanya numpang lewat di penyisihan grup. Berat memang, tetapi kita harus punya mimpi ke sana,” tutur Iwan Bule.
Di Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020, skuat Garuda Nusantara bergabung di Grup K bersama Timor Leste, Hong Kong dan Korea Utara.
Pada pertandingan pertama, Rabu (6 November), Timnas U-19 Indonesia akan menghadapi Timor Leste, lalu dilanjutkan melawan Hong Kong pada Jumat (8 November). Di pertandingan pamungkas, Indonesia bersua Korea Utara di Stadion Utama Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta, Minggu (10 November).
text:
U-19 National Team Competing in AFC Qualifications, This is Iwan Bule's Hope
Nov. 04, 2019, 22:04 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PSSI hopes that the Indonesian national team or U-19 national team will be the best in Group K of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup on 6-10 November 2019 at the Madora Gelora Bung Karno Stadium, Jakarta.
According to the General Chairman of PSSI Komjen Pol. Mochamad Iriawan at the Kemenpora Office, Jakarta, Monday, was in order to meet the expectations of the community. "The national team should be able to be the pride of the people," said the man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule.
The U-19 national team is not required to qualify for the 2020 U-19 Asian Cup to advance to the 2021 U-20 World Cup.
Because, Indonesia as the host of the 2021 U-20 World Cup automatically qualifies for the finals. That is, coach Fakhri Husaini's care team is actually not burdened to be the best in the U-19 Asian Cup Qualifiers.
However, PSSI still asked Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi and friends to perform optimally in the qualifications.
"Mr. President Joko Widodo previously also said that Indonesia would not only be the organizer of the U-20 World Cup. We should not only ride through the group stage. It's hard, but we have to have a dream there, ”said Iwan Bule.
In the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup, the Garuda Nusantara squad joined in Group K with Timor Leste, Hong Kong and North Korea.
In the first match, Wednesday (November 6), the Indonesian U-19 national team will face Timor Leste, then continue against Hong Kong on Friday (November 8). In the final match, Indonesia met North Korea at the Bung Karno Main Stadium, Jakarta, Sunday (November 10).
